name: Virus Origin
description:
You are a brand new virus that is trying to leave a mark in the world. Fight through anti-virus software in order to destroy more System(x32)'s.

This game was made in game jam from IPMAIA university in the course Development of Digital Games

Controls:

  • Move - WASD/Arrow/Left Stick
  • Aim - Mouse not working properly/ Right Stick
  • Attack - Right Trigger/ Left Button
